name: io.cordova.hellocordova
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.build-linux: tsc && cp build-linux.json build.json && cordova platform add electron && cordova build electron --release
scripts.build-windows: tsc && copy build-windows.json build.json && cordova platform add electron && cordova build electron --release
scripts.build-mac: tsc && cp build-mac.json build.json && cordova platform add electron && cordova build electron --release
scripts.build-android: tsc && cordova platform add android && cordova build android --release
scripts.build-browser: tsc && cordova platform add browser && cordova build browser

author: Apache Cordova Team
